.log

attaching .log since it has other entries related to platform-launcher
directory in plugins directory.

The problem is in the code from FeatureModel and more precisely in the fact that
arrayTypeFor(List l) returns null and that the method toArray() does not like
getting null as a parameter.

I got this because for the following reason:
discoverySiteInfo was not null but its size was 0.

I can put in a workaround to get releng going, but a fix would be good.

This is legacy code that works well when the input list is non empty.
I will add a check for empty list on all places that call the arrayTypeFor.
